description: Submission of partial details pursuant to condition 42 (Air Permeability Testing - Blocks A1 Only) of planning permission 2019/2514 dated 09/12/2020
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The submitted details have been reviewed by the Sustainability Officer in the CUDS team who have commented that the details submitted are acceptable (referenced below).&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The submitted details satisfy the requirements of condition 42 of 2019/2514. The development shall thereafter be implemented and maintained in complete accordance with the approved details. The approved details in relation to this condition are considered to be.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-dacf8033-7fff-a780-9bae-e53c337a6536"></span></p><ul style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-inline-start:48px;"><li dir="ltr"
